settings.title: Quality Of Www.Kalkifashion.Com Products
settings.infos: As an international brand, we ahere to strict quality and design benchmarks. Every KALKI product goes through a 5 step Quality Control process to ensure that you receive the best.

settings.title: Will I Have To Pay Duties Or Taxes?
settings.infos: Taxes and Duties depend on your Shipping Destination. VAT, Custom, and Import Duties are not included in our ordering process, but may be levied as per rules and regulations set forth by your government.

settings.title: Where Is My Order Number?
settings.infos:
Option 1. - Go to My Account

Please login to your account My orders to Track your Order

You will get to know the status of your order (If it it Processing, confirmed, out for delivery, packed etc.)

If you would like to talk to our customer care representative about your order, you could give us a call on

(India) +91 22-489-00416
(US) +1 (408) 520-9415
(UK) +44 (203) 287-9415

Option 2. - Track Order Link

Please go to Track Order on the Footer or Click on the link link here

Enter Your 9 Digit Order number (E.g : 1100041785) and Order Email id

You will get to know the status of your order (If it it Processing, confirmed, out for delivery, packed etc.)

If you would like to talk to our customer care representative about your order, you could give us a call on

settings.title: What Are The Shipping Charges For International Orders?
settings.infos:
We offer free shipping for selected countries only. We have delivery partnered to ensure guaranteed and timely deliveries. The shipping charges will be charged 19.95 USD for orders below 200 USD. Note, the free shipping above 200 USD is restricted to the list of 22 countries listed below. Any other country apart from these will always be charged for shipping. To know more about your shipping cost check here https://www.kalkifashion.com/shipping

1.Australia

2.Baharin

3.Canada

4.Denmark

5.France

6.Germany

7.HongKong

settings.title: Does KALKI Ship To Multiple Addresses?
settings.infos: We do not deliver to Multiple Addresses for a single order. If you'd like us to ship to multiple addresses, we request you place separate orders for separate destinations.
